LanguageData.Chitchat.stages.0.label: 进行聊天
LanguageData.DeepTalk.stages.0.label: 进行谈心
LanguageData.Slighted.stages.0.label: 被冷落
LanguageData.Insulted.stages.0.label: 被侮辱
LanguageData.InsultedMood.stages.0.label: 被侮辱
LanguageData.InsultedMood.stages.0.description: 那人张口就骂了我！什么人啊！
LanguageData.RapportBuilt.stages.0.label: 已建立和睦关系
LanguageData.HadAngeringFight.stages.0.label: 生气地打了一仗
LanguageData.HadCatharticFight.stages.0.label: 发泄地打了一仗
LanguageData.HarmedMe.stages.0.label: 伤害了我
LanguageData.BotchedMySurgery.stages.0.label: 搞砸了我的手术
LanguageData.RescuedMe.stages.0.label: 救了我
LanguageData.RecruitedMe.stages.0.label: 招降了我
LanguageData.CrashedTogether.stages.0.label: 坠入爱河
LanguageData.SoldMyLovedOne.stages.0.label: 恋人{0}被卖了
LanguageData.SoldMyLovedOne.stages.0.description: 有人把我爱的人像一块肉一样卖给了商人！
LanguageData.SoldMyBondedAnimal.stages.0.label: 宠物{0}被卖了
LanguageData.SoldMyBondedAnimal.stages.0.description: 有人把我的爱宠卖给了商人！
LanguageData.RebuffedMyRomanceAttempt.stages.0.label: 拒绝了我
LanguageData.RebuffedMyRomanceAttemptMood.stages.0.de: 我想谈次恋爱，但是却吃了闭门羹，真是让我难过。
LanguageData.FailedRomanceAttemptOnMe.stages.0.label: 拒绝了其表白
LanguageData.BrokeUpWithMe.stages.0.label: 跟我分手了
LanguageData.BrokeUpWithMeMood.stages.0.label: 跟{0}分手
LanguageData.BrokeUpWithMeMood.stages.0.description: 我就像一包垃圾一样被甩了。
LanguageData.CheatedOnMe.stages.0.label: 给我戴绿帽
LanguageData.CheatedOnMeMood.stages.0.label: 被{0}背叛
LanguageData.CheatedOnMeMood.stages.0.description: 怎么可以有人给我戴绿帽子！
LanguageData.DivorcedMe.stages.0.label: 跟我离婚了
LanguageData.DivorcedMeMood.stages.0.label: 跟{0}离婚
LanguageData.DivorcedMeMood.stages.0.description: 曾经的海誓山盟，现在狗屁都不是！
LanguageData.RejectedMyProposal.stages.0.label: 拒绝我的求婚
LanguageData.RejectedMyProposalMood.stages.0.label: 我的求婚被{0}拒了
LanguageData.RejectedMyProposalMood.stages.0.descript: 我觉得我们已经到了可以结婚的地步了，然而只是我一厢情愿。
LanguageData.IRejectedTheirProposal.stages.0.label: 拒绝了其求婚
LanguageData.HoneymoonPhase.stages.0.label: 蜜月阶段
LanguageData.HoneymoonPhase.stages.0.description: 能一起开始一段新的生活真的是太棒了！
LanguageData.GotSomeLovin.stages.0.label: 滚床单
LanguageData.GotSomeLovin.stages.0.description: 没有什么事儿比起滚床单能更让人兴奋的了！
LanguageData.KilledMyFriend.stages.0.label: 杀了我朋友
LanguageData.KilledMyRival.stages.0.label: 杀了我对手

LanguageData.KilledMyMother.stages.0.label: 杀了我母亲
LanguageData.KilledMySon.stages.0.label: 杀了我儿子
LanguageData.KilledMyDaughter.stages.0.label: 杀了我女儿
LanguageData.KilledMyBrother.stages.0.label: 杀了我兄弟
